item.title: Store NUT metrics in Prometheus so we can display them with Grafana
item.description: I ordered a second UPS because thanks to PeaNUT, I saw that my current UPS is only providing 20 minutes of uptime. Unfortunately, as of this post, PeaNUT will only read one UPS’ metrics from Network UPS Tools per PeaNUT instance, so I’m going to start scraping the metrics into Prometheus and displaying them with Grafana. Here’s how I did it.

item.title: Setup Prometheus and Grafana in Your Homelab
item.description:
I wanted nice graphs for the various metrics I collect in my homelab and from my Home Assistant server.

Here’s how I installed Prometheus and Grafana in my homelab to get them.
